data.title: Clark County Justice Court, NV
data.text:
Judge Ann E. Zimmerman

Ann E. Zimmerman

Department Eight

Las Vegas Township Justice Court

Term of Office 2000 - present

Julie Olness-Weinner, Judicial Executive Assistant

Office: (702) 671-3408

Fax: (702) 385-8912

Email: LVJCDepartment8@ClarkCountyNV.gov

Department 8 Zoom Information

Judge Zimmerman served from March 1997 through November 2000 as a Deputy Attorney General in the Nevada Office of the Attorney General. She was responsible for prosecution of insurance fraud and theft-related crimes.

From April 1994 to March 1997, Judge Zimmerman owned a private practice law firm practicing primarily in the area of criminal defense, family law, and personal injury.

Judge Zimmerman practiced law with the Firm of Murdock & Palazzo from May 1993 through April 1994, primarily in the areas of criminal defense, family law, civil litigation and personal injury. From July 1991 to May 1993, Judge Zimmerman worked in the Law Offices of Ian Christopherson practicing primarily in the areas of criminal defense, family law and civil litigation. From March 1990 through June 1991, Judge Zimmerman was an Assistant Prosecuting Attorney with the Office of the Jackson County Prosecutor in Kansas City, Missouri. She was responsible for prosecution of family support and paternity cases.

Judge Zimmerman is admitted to practice in the following Jurisdictions:

State of Missouri - Admitted in 1989; State of Kansas - Admitted in 1990; State of Nevada - Admitted in 1991; United States District Court for the Western District of Missouri - Admitted in 1989; United States District Court for the State of Kansas - Admitted in 1990; United States District Court for the State of Nevada - Admitted in 1991; Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals - Admitted in 1999

Judge Zimmerman's educational background:

1989 Juris Doctor University of Missouri-Kansas City; 1986 Bachelor of Arts, Political Science University of Missouri - Columbia.

Judge Zimmerman's Community Service Associations (past and present):

Shade Tree Shelter, Board of Trustees

Make A Wish Foundation

Annual Adopt-A-Veteran Program for the Holidays

State Bar of Nevada Fee Dispute Committee

Standing Committee on Judicial Ethics and Election Practices

Indigent Defense Committee

Judicial Council of the State of Nevada

Clark County Regional Judicial Council

Professional Organizations

Current: Member, Nevada Bar Association; Member; Clark County Bar Association; Member, Nevada Judges Association; Member, American Judges Association; Member, National Association of Women Judges.

Past: Vice-Chair, State Bar of Nevada Young Lawyers Section; Member, Nevada Trial Lawyers Association.
